definition.para: Information about other sources in which a description of or information about the resource may be found.

instructions.para: Provide information about one or more sources which provide additional information about the resource.
Provide information about one or more sources which provide additional information about the resource.

customization.para: Provide any references to other Sephardic ballad collections given for this ballad as it is described in "Romances judeo-españoles de Oriente : nueva recolección".
Locate the song in "Romances judeo-españoles de Oriente: nueva recolección" by Rina Benmayor and Judith H. Mauleón.
Copy the list of cross references, including the abbreviation and numeric page number, which appears after the word "bibliographia."
Separate multiple values with a semicolon and space ("; ").
Legend: MP = Menendez Pidal; CAT-IND = Armistead and Silverman; RJEO = Romances judeo-españoles de Oriente.
Optional: Provide information about one or more sources which provide additional information about the resource.

example.para: See the Wikipedia entry "Application profile" at the following URL for more information about this resource:
See the Wikipedia entry "Application profile" at the following URL for more information about this resource:

history.justification: Collection owner would like to provde information about other ballad collections containing a given resource.
